p: In essence, similar technology infrastructure currently used by remote monitoring programs can also be used to incorporate a thermometer for monitoring patients that are suspected of having COVID-19. The Sense Followup Ebola app has an automatic alert system for temperature readings ≥38 °C for individuals receiving follow-up care [ 35]. A similar feature could also be incorporated in future COVID-19 apps. Furthermore, the app could pair with advanced thermometers that allow continuous and real-time monitoring of changes in body temperature [ 36, 37].
